description: Designed to feel weightless, the Resistor Lite Chino Shorts is ideal for the dog days of summer. Soft, breathable, and equipped with unmatched stretch and rebound, you'll experience superior mobility with every step. Classic chino style with durable, on-trail performance. Resistance is futile.
name: Kuhl Resistor Lite Chino Shorts, 8" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: Xkanvas Lite - 70% Cotton, 25% Nylon, 5% Spandex - 176 g
two front chino, one coin, two double welt at back, and two drop in cell phone pockets
